title: ICMR NARFBR Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 07 Scientist Posts
description: The Indian Council of Medical Research, National Animal Resource Facility for Biomedical Research (ICMR-NARFBR) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 07 Scientist C, D, and E Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, Pharm.D., Post-graduation, and Ph.D. can apply for the ICMR NARFBR Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply...
